bibdata.title: American National Standard for Determination of Uniformity of Solid Gamma-Emitting Flood Sources
American National Standard for Determination of Uniformity of Solid Gamma-Emitting Flood Sources

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Minimum informational requirements for a Test and Measurement Report for flood sources used with scintillation cameras are provided. It is not intended to specify the means by which such information is obtained although it does place requirements and limitations on the methodology. In addition, it is not intended to cover the use of the source in the determination of the operating characteristics or correction factors for a scintillation camera.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
